name: Graffiti Restro Cafe and Wine Bar
description: A chic, upscale restaurant offering a blend of locally sourced dishes with Cajun flair.

name: Lemon Zest
description: Fine dining with a focus on international dishes, including New York strip steak and seafood.

name: El Hicaco Seafood
description: Stunning beachfront dining, known for fresh seafood like shrimp & rice or octopus burrata.

name: Tacobar Jaco
description: A casual spot offering a variety of tacos with fresh ingredients.

name: Koko Gastro Pub
description: Relaxed beachfront pub with ocean views, serving seafood and varied cuisine.

name: Puddlefish Brewery
description: A local craft brewery offering gourmet pub food like wraps, burgers, and nachos.

name: Soda Rustica
description: A traditional Costa Rican soda offering casado lunches with local flavor.

name: Sabress Kosher Restaurant
description: Kosher Mediterranean food, including falafels, hummus, and shakshuka in a family-friendly setting.

name: Zona K Bistro
description: Latin, Asian, and Continental fusion dishes in a small gourmet restaurant.
